trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_TALK_ACTOR<tab>All right. I presume you've brought the necessary documentation, then?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_001_01<tab>We'll see to the rest, don't you worry. Be sure you don't misplace your proof of covering─you'll need it when you return to collect the fledgling.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_001_02<tab>To confirm the date after which you may collect your fledgling, refer to the proof of covering's help text.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_001_01<tab>Hold on─didn't we just arrange a covering for you? I'm afraid there are certain restrictions...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_001_02<tab>You cannot arrange another covering until you have collected your newborn fledgling.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_002_01<tab>Hm? You haven't <var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> retired chocobo registration forms? You do realize they're essential, don't you?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_002_02<tab>You cannot arrange a covering without a retired chocobo registration form in your possession.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_003_01<tab>Maybe it's just me, but you seem to be carrying an awful lot at the moment...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_003_02<tab>You cannot arrange a covering without space in your inventory to store the proof of covering.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_004_01<tab>I see you've brought a retired chocobo registration form. That's good. Unfortunately, you don't seem to have any forms for a compatible chocobo. That's bad.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_004_02<tab>You cannot arrange a covering without forms for two compatible chocobos.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACECOUPLING_00235_ERROR_004_03<tab>All coverings require a sire and a dam. However, please note that both chocobos cannot be breeding stock.
